info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 02 at 5:18PM CDT until April 02 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LIMESTONE AND EAST CENTRAL FALLS COUNTIES... At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 10 miles east of Marlin, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Thornton, Kosse and McClanahan. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
